author: Joshua Jamerson
title: Republicans Bolster Candidate in Pennsylvania Special Election
text:
MT. LEBANON, Pa.—It’s all hands on deck to help Republican Rick Saccone win a special election for a U.S. House seat that is deep in Trump country.

GOP-affiliated groups—including the National Republican Congressional Committee, the House GOP’s campaign arm; the Congressional Leadership Fund, a super PAC aligned with House Speaker Paul Ryan; the Republican National Committee; and two pro-Trump PACs, 45Committee and America First Action—have collectively poured about $9.1 million into the Pittsburgh-area race, according to...
